description:
Inside The Facebook Essentials Training Course you will learn how to establish your business and attract new customers using the power of Facebook.

We cover all the foundation steps you need to take to ensure you get maximum results from your Facebook marketing efforts.

Everything is covered with our 9 easy to follow, over the shoulder training videos that run to just under 1 hour of quality material, that will turn you into a Facebook marketing master.

Here's what's covered inside the course:

  • Course Overview and an Introduction to Facebook pages
  • How to Find Niches Full of Passionate, Ready to Buy Fans
  • How to Set Up Your Facebook Page the Correct Way
  • How to Establish Instant Authority in Your Niche by Giving Your Page A Professional Design
  • Introduction to Custom Tabs - How to Get Them, and How to Use Them to Your Advantage
  • Status Updates - When, What, How, and Why?
  • How to View Your Audience Insights to Gain A Better Understanding of What Your Audience Wants
  • How to Easily Grow the Number of Fans Your Facebook Page Has and Turn Those Fans Into Traffic to Your Websites
  • How to Scale Your Facebook Marketing Efforts

So if you're just starting out with Facebook Marketing, or you just want to learn how to get better results with your marketing efforts, this course is definitely perfect for you!
title: Facebook Essentials - Facebook Marketing for Beginners
